doc.name: TaskCoordinator
doc.description: An actor that coordinator a set of clients connecting to it to work together to finish some tasks. It has an inner class that implements the Coordinator interface defined in Coordinator.idl. The clients connect to this need to implement the Client interface defined in Coordinator.idl also. Specify the ORB initial property with theORBInitProperties paremerter, for example: "-ORBInitialHost xyz.eecs.berkeley.edu -ORBInitialPort 1050" where "xyz.eecs.berkeley.edu" is the machine runing name server, and "1050" is the port for name service. Specify the name of the coordinator with coordinatorName that it wants to register to the name service.
doc.author: Yang Zhao
